actions: Expels Wind-Dampness, disperses Cold, warms and activates the channels, stops pain, reduces swellings, induces ulceration and dispels putrefication.
Disperses Cold, scours out Wind, overcomes Dampness, stops pain, reduces swellings and treats abscesses and lesions.
Warms the Middle Jiao and alleviates pain.
Promotes healing of oral ulcerations and relieves toothache.
Reduces swelling, eliminates toxins and expels pus.
With Xi Xin, for Wind-Cold induced headaches, sinus headaches, orbital headaches and toothaches aggravated by cold air.
With Xi Xin and Zhi Chuan Wu, for headaches with excessive Cold.

symptoms: Discolored, purplish, patchy or dark red atrophic gums
Persistent insomnia with much dreaming and restlessness
Broken vessels or spider naevi on the face, trunk, inner knee and ankle
Purplish lips, sclera, conjunctiva and nails
Pain that is fixed, stabbing and /or severe
Blue, dark or purplish discoloration of skin in small or large areas
Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
manifestations.tongue: Purple, possible purple or red spots

notes: Combine the ingredients and warmed alcohol in a container for a few minutes, Tip the alcohol off of the herbs and use it to rinse the gums and mouth, then spit it out. Repeat until all of the alcohol is used up
